name: Droid (exq_bytes)
description:
Blast your way through 35 stages of increasingly hostile and diverse enemy droids. Destroy all the enemy droids in each stage to progress to the next. Droid features numerous sophisticated scoring methods and secret scoring techniques.

Droid includes two game modes:

Easy - 10 unique stages to help you to get to grips with some of the scoring techniques.

Hard - an additional 25 stages to hone the skills you learn in Easy mode.

Each game mode features its own local hi-score table.
